title: 1.10.2forge崩溃
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1653339032 于 2019-5-24 15:23 编辑 

1.10.2forge没有装如何MOD java版本是1.8.0_211崩溃日记：
[15:17:12] [main/INFO] *** Hello Minecraft! Launcher 2.4.1.6 ***
[15:17:12] [main/INFO] Initialized settings.
[15:17:46] [AWT-EventQueue-0/INFO] Start generating launching command...
[15:17:47] [Game Launcher/INFO] Building process
[15:17:47] [Game Launcher/INFO] Logging in...
[15:17:49] [Game Launcher/INFO] Detecting libraries...
[15:17:49] [Game Launcher/INFO] Unpacking natives...
[15:17:50] [Game Launcher/INFO] *** Make shell command ***
[15:17:50] [Game Launcher/INFO] On making head command.
[15:17:50] [Game Launcher/INFO] Java Version: 1.8.0_211
[15:17:50] [Game Launcher/INFO] Java Platform: 64
[15:17:50] [Game Launcher/INFO] System Platform: 64
[15:17:50] [Game Launcher/INFO] System Physical Memory: 3993
[15:17:50] [Game Launcher/INFO] On making launcher args.
[15:17:50] [Game Launcher/INFO] Starting process
[15:17:50] [Game Launcher/INFO] Have started the process
[15:18:35] [ProcessMonitor/INFO] Process exit code: -1073740940
[15:18:35] [ProcessMonitor/ERROR] The game exited abnormally, exit code: -1073740940

replies.author: Bord是大神
replies.txt_content:
没有装forge还想要加mod？？这根本就是异想天开了
Forge是个API，直接拖入mods文件夹的都必须有API支持，而且一个模组通常只支持一个API，LiteLoader模组有forge也不行，forge模组有LiteLoader也不行
所以你必须有Forge才能装模组，除非你要装的是BetterFPS或Optfine这种为数不多的可以安装到核心文件里面的不一定要拖到mods文件夹里面的模组
而且你的崩溃日志一下子就看出来问题了，你用的是HMCL 2.4.1.6，这算是远古版本了，请更新你的启动器

replies.author: 森林蝙蝠
replies.txt_content: 请不要用HMCL2.4去启动MC，这是老版本了。
